name: Albatross
description: Spheda club.  Good for long and curved shots.

name: Anti-Curse Amulet
description: Prevents enemy curse attacks but breaks after a while.

name: Anti-Goo Amulet
description: Prevents enemy gooey attacks but breaks after a while.

name: Anti-Petrify Amulet
description: Prevents enemy petrify attacks.  Eventually breaks.

name: Antidote Amulet
description: Prevents enemy poison attacks.  Eventually breaks.

name: Antidote Drink
description: Cleanses poison from the body.

name: Aquarium
description: Aquarium for fish.  Raise them well!

name: Bandit Brassard
description: Lets you steal enemy's items in battle.

name: Barrel Cannon
description: Made from a water barrel, but it doesn't shoot water!

name: Barrel Cannon II
description: Made from a water barrel, but it doesn't shoot water!

name: Barrel Cannon III
description: Made from a water barrel, but it doesn't shoot water!

name: Barrel Cannon IV
description: Made from a water barrel, but it doesn't shoot water!

name: Bell Trigger
description: Charming gun made from a bell.  Kind of cute, really.

name: Bomb
description: Causes great damage when thrown at an opponent.

name: Bone Rapier
description: Sword made of bone. Its abilities are unknown.

name: Bread
description: Restores a little health when eaten.

name: Bucket Leg
description: Unique part made of buckets.  Won't rust, either.

name: Bucket Pack
description: Based on a steel bucket.  Will this actually work?

name: Buggy
description: High speeds over any surface! Whee!

name: Cannon Ball Arm
description: Arm part with a steel ball.  A mean one-two punch.

name: Cannon Ball Arm II
description: Arm part with a steel ball.  A mean one-two punch.

name: Cannon Ball Arm III
description: Arm part with a steel ball.  A mean one-two punch.

name: Cannon Ball Arm IV
description: Arm part with a steel ball.  A mean one-two punch.

name: Caterpillar
description: Travels smoothly over the bumpiest of roads, but slow.

name: Cheese
description: Fairly good restoration of health when eaten.

name: Cleaner Pack
description: Energy pack made out of an empty vacuum cleaner.

name: Clown Body
description: Torso part made to look like a clown.

name: Clown Foot
description: Ridepod foot part made to look like a clown's foot.

name: Clown Hand
description: Ridepod arm part made to look like a clown's hand.

name: Clown Hand II
description: Ridepod arm part made to look like a clown's hand.

name: Clown Hand III
description: Ridepod arm part made to look like a clown's hand.

name: Clown Hand IV
description: Ridepod arm part made to look like a clown's hand.

name: Clown Shoes
description: Clown's Shoes.  Might make you a snappy dancer.

name: Cubic Hammer
description: Powerful. Sharp corners. Delivers heavy damage.

name: Dark Viper
description: Sucks up and absorbs the effect of enemy attack.

name: Digi Hammer
description: High-tech hammer designed for efficient attack.

name: Double Pudding
description: Fully restores the health on two characters when eaten.

name: Dragon Shoes
description: Made from dragon scales.  Lets you walk on hot floors.

name: Drill Arm
description: Arm part with a drill on the end.  Bores into any enemy!

name: Drill Arm II
description: Arm part with a drill on the end.  Bores into any enemy!

name: Drill Arm III
description: Arm part with a drill on the end.  Bores into any enemy!

name: Drill Arm IV
description: Arm part with a drill on the end.  Bores into any enemy!

name: Drum Can Body
description: Torso part made out of a Drum Can.

name: Energy Pack
description: Max's first invention.  Now the Ridepod is all set!

name: Energy Pack (Barrel)
description: Improved Energy Pack.  Has more capacity.

name: Energy Pack (Urn)
description: Energy pack made out of an urn. Don't break it!

name: Escape Powder
description: Allows you to escape dungeons on command.

name: Falcon
description: Spheda club.  Good for long shots.

name: Final Bomb
description: Bomb with a wide explosive range.  Difficult to make.

name: Flamingo
description: Spheda club.  Good for medium range and curved shots.

name: Gift Capsule
description: Put an item inside as a present to a monster.

name: Grenade Launcher
description: Allows rapid-fire of grenades.  A little heavy.

name: Hammer Arm
description: This arm crushes enemies with its tremendous hammer.

name: Hammer Arm II
description: This arm crushes enemies with its tremendous hammer.

name: Hammer Arm III
description: This arm crushes enemies with its tremendous hammer.

name: Hammer Arm IV
description: This arm crushes enemies with its tremendous hammer.

name: Heavy Hammer
description: Battle hammer that packs a heavy wallop.

name: Holy Water
description: Lifts curses.  Causes heavy damage against the undead.

name: Improved Bomb
description: The old bomb, but now with a bigger explosion.

name: Iron Leg
description: Leg part made out of iron.  It's strong, but slow.

name: Jet Hover
description: Yippee! Whoosh!  It's invigorating to go so fast!

name: Knight Boots
description: Light boots made especially for female knights.

name: Laser Arm
description: Arm fires homing lasers.  Great on flying enemies!

name: Laser Arm II
description: Arm fires homing lasers.  Great on flying enemies!

name: Laser Arm III
description: Arm fires homing lasers.  Great on flying enemies!

name: Laser Arm IV
description: Arm fires homing lasers.  Great on flying enemies!

name: Leather Shoes
description: Maximilian's favorite shoes.

name: Level-up Powder
description: Instantly upgrades a weapon to the next level.

name: Lightspeed
description: Bomb that shoots lasers like fireworks.

name: Lure Rod
description: Rod that can take a lure.

name: Machine Gun Arm
description: Ridepod arm equipped with a machine gun.

name: Machine Gun Arm II
description: Ridepod arm equipped with a machine gun.

name: Machine Gun Arm III
description: Ridepod arm equipped with a machine gun.

name: Machine Gun Arm IV
description: Ridepod arm equipped with a machine gun.

name: Magic Gun
description: Forms magic power in the atmosphere into bullets.

name: Metal Boots
description: Boots made of metal.  Great against heat, but heavy.

name: Milk Can Body
description: Torso part made in the shape of a huge Milk Can.

name: Missile Pod Arm
description: Fires missiles.  Effective on many enemies at once.

name: Missile Pod Arm II
description: Fires missiles.  Effective on many enemies at once.

name: Missile Pod Arm III
description: Fires missiles.  Effective on many enemies at once.

name: Missile Pod Arm IV
description: Fires missiles.  Effective on many enemies at once.

name: Multi Feet
description: Hey, four have got to be better than two, right?

name: Non-Stop Amulet
description: Prevents enemy stop attacks.  Breaks after a while.

name: Nova Cannon
description: Changes the sun's energy into a powerful attack beam.

name: Nova Cannon II
description: Changes the sun's energy into a powerful attack beam.

name: Nova Cannon III
description: Changes the sun's energy into a powerful attack beam.

name: Nova Cannon IV
description: Changes the sun's energy into a powerful attack beam.

name: Panther Boots
description: Boots for the elegant, sexy lady.

name: Poison Wrench
description: Wrench that can sting the enemy with poison.

name: Premium Chicken
description: Fully restores health when eaten.

name: Princess Boots
description: Wear them with the Princess Dress.  The perfect princess!

name: Propeller Leg
description: Spins round and round and lifts you into the air.

name: Question Shooter
description: Interrogates the enemy.

name: Refrigerator Body
description: It's made out of a Refrigerator, so it's cold.

name: Resurrection Powder
description: Prevents unconsciousness when equipped.

name: Ridepod Fuel
description: Use it to refuel the Ridepod.

name: Roller Foot
description: Foot that lets you glide along like on roller skates.

name: Ruler's Sword
description: Sword once used by the legendary Aga.

name: Samurai Arm
description: Powerful arm equipped with a Japanese sword.  Very sweet!

name: Samurai Arm II
description: Powerful arm equipped with a Japanese sword.  Very smooth!

name: Samurai Arm III
description: Powerful arm equipped with a Japanese sword.  Very smooth!

name: Samurai Body
description: Torso part made to look like a samurai of the East.

name: Sand Breaker
description: Rare sword made from desert sand.  Easily broken, though.

name: Sexy Panther
description: A sexy little number.  Can't get enough of this one.

name: Smash Wrench
description: Powerful wrench that smashes monsters into pieces.

name: Soap
description: Cleanses goo.

name: Soul Breaker
description: Legend says it can smash any living creature's soul.

name: Spike Boots
description: Let you walk normally over slippery floors.

name: Stamina Drink
description: Bestows energy.  A temporary ability boost.

name: Star Breaker
description: Its trademark is the destroyed star on its side.

name: Steal Gun
description: Steals enemy's items.  Also called the "Thief Gun."

name: Stinger Wrench
description: Special wrench that can steal items from the enemy.

name: Sun & Moon Armor
description: Strongest torso of all. Contains ancient strength.

name: Super-Alloy Body
description: Super-alloy torso. Defends against almost any attack.

name: Swan
description: Spheda Club.  Good for medium range.

name: Tasty Water
description: From a deep mountain spring.  Simply mouth-watering.

name: Treasure Chest Key
description: A key for a treasure chest.  Defeats traps, too.

name: Triple-Urn Pack
description: Energy pack made out of three urns.

name: Trumpet Gun
description: Gun made from a trumpet.  What'll they think of next?

name: Turkey
description: Spheda putter. Good for short distances.

name: Twin Buster
description: A double-barreled gun.  Twice the power?

name: Wild Cat
description: Cursed machine gun. Brings out the beast in its user.

name: Wing Boots
description: Let you walk even over muddy floors with ease.

name: Wing Shoes
description: Nice, airy shoes. Easy to wear. Make you feel any lighter?

name: Wise Owl Sword
description: Legendary sword made by the white-bearded owl's artisan.

name: Wooden Box Body
description: Wooden Box torso part.  Surprisingly sturdy.

name: Work Shoes
description: Shoes for working in.  Who cares if they get dirty?
